word_group.brief_definition: 澳大利亚口音；澳洲口音
浓重的口音；浓厚的口音；口音重
装出某种腔调；影响口音

bilingual.source: Bob hasn't lost his strong Irish accent.
bilingual.target: 鲍勃还没有失去他浓重的爱尔兰口音。
她的口音听起来很英式。

bilingual.source: They like to laugh at my accent.
bilingual.target: 他们喜欢取笑我的口音。
她有一个浓重的法国口音。
他的英国口音非常浓重。

list.abstract: accent是一个函数。如果在标注文字和标注线之间有垂直的强调线，本属性为True。Long类型，可读写。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you trying to do a British accent?
What can I say? It's funnier with the accent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那又怎么样？带口音比较好玩嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: You have difficulty remembering vocabulary. You have thick accent perhaps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 记单字对你来说很困难，你有很重的口音。

yingyinNormal.en: Lubbock. I had a much thicker accent to get rid of than you all. How do you know I had one?
yingyinNormal.zh: 拉布克。我想改口音可比你们难多了。你怎么知道我有口音?

yingyinNormal.en: Lose the accent. Do you know where you are? I'm in a dream.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去掉口音，你知道你身在何处吗？我在梦里。

yingyinNormal.en: Every time you tell that story, that guy's accent gets thicker and thicker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把那家伙的口音说得越来越重。

yingyinNormal.en: You can lose the accent. Do you know where you are? I'm in a dream.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去掉口音，你知道你身在何处吗？我在梦里。

yingyinNormal.en: How about that German accent? Yeah. Yeah. All of your W's were V's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这德国口音怎么样？不错，你的W全变成V了。

yingyinNormal.en: Then she moved to England and she picked up this fake British accent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 后来她搬去英国了，还学了假惺惺的英国口音。

yingyinNormal.en: And you, you said you weren't coming here, either. I have a thick accent. You don't know what I said.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你，你也说过不来的。我口音重着呢，你根本听不懂我的话。

yingyinNormal.en: No. After they got their own place, the houseboy got his own houseboy. Should have heard his accent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有，他们同居之后，男仆自己也有了男仆，你应该听听他的口音。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't get a lot of that because of your accent, but the general tone was soothing and somehow I feel better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然因为你的口音问题我没怎么听懂，但你的语气很抚慰人心，我感觉好多了。

yingyinNormal.en: My animals. Hey, the guy said they suited me, he spoke with an accent, I was all confused. I don't know what I'm gonna do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的动物，那店员说很适合我，他讲话有口音，我被搞迷糊了，我不知道该怎么办。

yingyinNormal.en: A customer service representative with an Indian accent will create the impression we're a vast enterprise that uses overseas call centers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个操着印度口音的客服能够给客人们留下一种我们这是跨国公司使用海外客服中心的印象。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good, an English accent, the sexiest accent you can have.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爽了，有英国腔的史上最性感的腔了。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Don't do the accent. It really bums me out. Emily said I was pretty good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别学英国腔，我很受不了。艾蜜莉说我学得很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, knock off the phony accent, Bobbie Jo, I know who you are. Okay, fine! But this here does not leave this here room!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别怪腔怪调的了，波比·乔，我知道是你。好吧，但是这件事不许传出这间屋子！

yingyinNormal.en: Then there was that dialect coach who helped you with that play where you needed a southern accent. Which after twenty hours of lessons still came out Jamaican.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我付钱请教练教你说南方腔，上了20小时的课后，你还是满口牙买加腔。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: ac-加在同辅音字母的词根前, 表"加强"

word_usage.usage:
with/in an accent表示“带有……口音”，如：
He speaks English with an American accent.
他说英语有种美国的腔调。

accented 表示“带有异国口音的”，如：
He spoke heavily accented English. 
他说英语带有浓重的异国口音。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Li Hua is sure foreigners will laugh at his <highlight>accent</highlight> when speaking English.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 李华确信外国人讲英语时会嘲笑他的口音。

examination_example.sentence: I feel like they will laugh at my <highlight>accent</highlight>(口音).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我感觉他们会嘲笑我的口音。

examination_example.sentence: First, it's Ok to speak English with an <highlight>accent</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一，说英语带口音无所谓。
